WorkItem.Description: Since version 2.1.8 Rawr crashes when i use the "Improved power word: Shield" talent on priest discipline spec. Donno if it's my pc, my gear or anything related to me. I attached the xml with my gear just in case you need to test with that.

Comments.Message: I loaded your Character, and clicked in 5/5 Twin Disciplines, 2/2 Imp PW: Fort, 3/3 Imp. Inner Fire, and 3/3 Imp PW:Shield and had no crash happen. Can you explain more in detail how you get a crash?

i arrived home and tested it on my personal PC. It seems to work very fine. Maybe it is something with my office computer. Anyway i cant provide any more details because i didnt do anything diferent at home and office.
About crash at work: it freezes("this program is not responding") only when adding imporved power word shield. Any other talents works fine. And my office pc has better configuration than my personal computer(so performance shouldn't be an issue).
I dont have any other details. Maybe the program gets in a conflict with some corporate tool that runs in background(so maybe you shouldnt bother more about this problem)

Thanks bye

If this happens on one PC there is a reason for it. I suggest you trying a complete reinstall and download your character from Armory over again, and set everything up from scratch. If it still happens on your Work computer then, then there is a real problem. If it stops happening, it might be a problem with an old data file.

I redownloaded the program at work, and i tried to put talents again in Imp PW: Shield, without using any gear or anything else in rawr. The program hanged, i had to leave the office and when i cam back after 10 min it was working (dehanged). Working is maybe to much said since the Imp PW:S icon was Samwise Didier's face.... I unlearned talents, relearned them... at any rank 1/2/3 i see samwise face. If it's unlearned i see normal icon.
Here is a pic. with what i see at work.
The icons are pulled from Blizzard's website, and they mis-named the icons for that talent. Samwise is the default backup icon for anything.
